title: WATCH: Watford's Abdoulaye Doucoure scores equaliser against Southampton with hand
description: Watford earned a point against Southampton thanks to Abdoulaye Doucoure's late handballed goal.
content: The midfielder pushed the ball into the net after it missed his head as Alex McCarthy rushed out to stop him.Southampton boss Mauricio Pellegrino and Watford striker Troy Deeney both said the goal should not have stood but, unfortunately for the visitors, it did.Watford had come from two goals down after James Ward-Prowse's double in the first-half but an Andre Gray header and Doucoure's goal, the game ended 2-2.Hit the video above to watch the goal
